mapper.insert: insert into reserve(reserve_num, reserve_person, reserve_date, reserve_pro, member_num, sch_num, event_code, court_code, event_date, event_time) values(reserve_incre.nextval, #{res_person}, SYSDATE, #{res_pro, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{m_no}, #{sch_num}, #{event_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{court_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_DATE(#{event_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{event_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from reserve natural left outer join school natural left outer join court where TO_CHAR(event_date, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') > 0 and member_num = #{m_no}
